item.title: Raichur DC urges speedy completion of airport construction
item.description:
<![CDATA[
Raichur: Deputy commissioner Nitish K urged that the airport construction work in Raichur be expedited and completed soon. He spoke after visiting the proposed site of the airport construction on the Yaramaras outskirts in Raichur and inspecting the work on Saturday. While inspecting the progress update on airport construction and infrastructure works, he instructed that the proposed runway, CRF building, ATC building, and all works outlined in the master plan should be completed within the ...]]>
item.author: Tnn
